scripts.build: run-p type-check build-only build-style && run-p build-minify
scripts.build-copy: npm run build && npm run copy-src
scripts.copy-src: shx cp dist/servicestack-vue.min.mjs ../ServiceStack/ServiceStack/src/ServiceStack/js/servicestack-vue.mjs && shx cp dist/servicestack-vue.mjs ../ServiceStack/ServiceStack/tests/NorthwindAuto/wwwroot/lib/mjs/
scripts.copy-diffusion: shx cp  dist/servicestack-vue.m* ../../netcore/VueDiffusion/MyApp/wwwroot/lib/mjs/ && shx cp dist/index.d.ts ../../netcore/VueDiffusion/MyApp/wwwroot/lib/typings/@servicestack/vue/
scripts.copy-creatorkit: shx cp dist/servicestack-vue.m* ../../netcore/CreatorKit/CreatorKit/wwwroot/lib/mjs/ && shx cp dist/servicestack-vue.m* ../../netcore/CreatorKit/CreatorKit/wwwroot/js/
